journey.title: How a Personalized Story Is Created
journey.subtitle: A gentle journey that starts with your child – and ends with a story you'll want to read together again and again

step1.caption:
Choose a story that begins with the emotion your child is feeling right now.
Small, gentle, and tailored to what they're going through at this moment.

step2.caption:
Your child becomes the heart of the story,
with a presence that feels natural, close, and familiar.

step3.caption:
Delicate, sensitive, and precise personalization,
one that respects the child's inner world.

step4.caption:
A story that truly feels like theirs,
one they'll want to return to again and again.
